20110109020206.000|20110109020207.000|CC1|WRAPPED UP IN A LOT OF NEWS THAT
20110109020207.000|20110109020210.000|CC1|CAME OUT.                       
20110109020210.000|20110109020211.000|CC1|THERE ARE 19 VICTIMS OF THE     
20110109020211.000|20110109020215.000|CC1|ATTACK BUT SIX OF THEM ARE DEAD.

20110109020216.000|20110109020218.000|CC1|ALONE.

20110109020223.000|20110109020224.000|CC1|ACCOMPANYING THE SUSPECT TO THE 
20110109020224.000|20110109020226.000|CC1|CRIME SCENE TODAY.

20110109020238.000|20110109020239.000|CC1|GREET EVENT WITH CONSTITUENTS AT

20110109021226.000|20110109021227.000|CC1|BELONGINGS BUT ARE NOT ALLOWED
